Action.author: rmohta
Action.body: ~nickgaski I have started working on this. Can you please confirm if the updates to the code should be pushed to https://github.com/IBM-Blockchain/marbles or some other repo?

Action.author: markparz
Action.body: Hi Rohit..Are you working on the document or something else? There is a item waiting to be merged here https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/7997/ check it out and make comments on this if you see something wrong.

Action.author: rmohta
Action.body: ~markparz I am working on the same. I'll try your setup now and let you know how it goes

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: Closing this. IBM published this and MarblesÂ is still an ibm-blockchain repo. If Marbles is contributed as a sample app, then we can reconsider.
